member.name: T:CSEx.Guests.IGuestState
member.summary: Base interface for all guest CPU state representations. Provides common functionality needed across all architectures.

member.name: P:CSEx.Guests.IGuestState.GuestWordSize
member.summary: The guest word size (32 or 64 bits)

member.name: P:CSEx.Guests.IGuestState.GuestIPType
member.summary: The instruction pointer type for this architecture

member.name: M:CSEx.Guests.IGuestState.Initialize
member.summary: Initialize the guest state to default values

member.name: M:CSEx.Guests.IGuestState.DeepCopy
member.summary: Create a deep copy of the guest state

member.name: M:CSEx.Guests.IGuestState.GetRegisterOffset(System.String)
member.summary: Get the offset of a guest register within the state structure
member.returns: Byte offset within the state structure

member.name: M:CSEx.Guests.IGuestState.GetRegisterType(System.String)
member.summary: Get the type of a guest register
member.returns: The IR type of the register

member.name: M:CSEx.Guests.IGuestState.RequiresPreciseMemoryExceptions(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Check if the architecture requires precise memory exceptions for a given offset range
member.returns: True if precise exceptions are required
